features: Bringing back the original KillMoney plugin for PocketMine-MP servers.
Permission nodes to get money by killing other players.
Send messages to the killer/victim (tags are on the config).
/killmoney command for quick view of config.
Fixed issue with the configuration file.
Fixed issue "Enable plugin is set to false"
Configuration file updated. REQUIRES old config.yml deletion.
Fixes: server is not able to startup due to missing dependency.
